name: Army Sniper Shooting - eXtreme Assassin Combat Shooter Edition
name_original: Army Sniper Shooting - eXtreme Assassin Combat Shooter Edition
description:
Get ready for an adrenaline pumping sniper shooter game where you need to eliminate all the targets. One by one, you need to make sure none of the bad guys are left!

FEATURES

* Multiple maps to explore!
* Lots of insane bad guys to shoot.
* Awesome soundtrack!
* Non stop thrill ride!

Good luck!
